thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 28 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Brother Enterprises Sees 2017 Net Profit Up, Plans Fund With Partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Brother Enterprises Sees 2017 Net Profit Up, Plans Fund With Partners

organizations.name: reuters) - brother enterprises holding co ltd

text:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - Brother Enterprises Holding Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT SEES 2017 NET PROFIT UP 140-170 PERCENT Y/Y FROM 167.7 MILLION YUAN ($26.54 million) YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT PLANS TO SET UP FUND WORTH UP TO 1.0 BILLION YUAN WITH PARTNERS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DTa8GF Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3199 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
